channel.title: Unjust Bans
channel.description:
[b]THIS POST IS ON BEHALF OF AMERIKA AND LEWK![/b]
I would talk to moparisthebest himself, but since I am banned from the forums and he nevers get on IRC, I asked a friend to post on our behalf.
First off, I believe that what Lewk and I did was childish, and unneeded.
Second, WE DIDN'T DO 1 THING TO THE FTP. They ruined the FTP part of the site, and therefore caused THEMSELVES HOURS OF TIME, and the so-called $700.
Another point I have is exactly what The Soul said in a previous post ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432078.msg3171778.html#msg3171778]here[/url]), asking Javafire why we (Lewk and I) should be punished on a COMPLETELY DIFFERENT FORUM than the incident happened? It's is rather dumb to be punished for something that didn't even happen on this forum.
Finally, no one was physically (exlcluding the people in the images we post, which we used to [b]annoy[/b] a SINGLE MEMBER of this site) hurt. Therefore, what's the damage?
We've heard people say we DoS'd the site, and that we used automated software or scripts to do what we did to their Forums. We did NOT USE ANY SOFTWARE. It was all manual effort of copy, paste, submit, repeat.
I know I will be instantly banned or something to that extent, but I am really trying to get a message out there, which was proved in the 3rd point. Why be punished on a completely different forum for something that happened on another, ant-size community.
Again, I'd like to state that Lewk and I regret what we have done, even though we may have found it funny at the [b]time[/b], we realize that we we're childish. Hope you can forgive us sometime down the line.
Regards, AMERIKA and `Lewk_

item.title: Unjust Bans
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

They may or may not get another chance down the track. Apologising with the expectation that you’ll be let off the hook is ridiculous though, so grow up.

And we have a clause in our rules that outlines an expectation for respect to other communities, big and small.

Read full topic

You tell me he contributed to the community.
[/quote]
seriously

what is a forum without one of those people that stand out and are funny?
without him and amerika this forum would probably be a tight ass one, all serious and shit[/quote]

item.title: Unjust Bans
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I do not want this ban lifted early. They should have thought before they did, knowing that the users were originally from MoparScape and would come here and rant about it. As a major community ourselves, you need to respect other communities as well.

Obviously people who thought these trolls were funny will try and lift this ban. What happens when they get their 2nd chance. I’d bet on that they continue their old ways. They should have been banned ages ago (for their constant trolling and spamming).

Read full topic

item.title: Unjust Bans
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:29, topic:335751”][quote author=idkman link=topic=432132.msg3172279#msg3172279 date=1270522277]

You guys represent the community, and sitting there spamming sites doesn’t look good. You guys are pretty funny, but there’s a line that cannot be crossed…

<AMERIKA`> We have recognized this line, and we are sorry for crossing it. What’s done is done. All we can ask is a 2nd chance…
[/quote]
THEY SHOULDA RECOGNIZED IT THE 5+ FUCKING TIMES THEY WERE MUTED WHILE THEY WERE HERE.

You guys represent the community, and sitting there spamming sites doesn’t look good. You guys are pretty funny, but there’s a line that cannot be crossed…

They haven’t even crossed ‘that line’. All you kids need to stop being cry babies especially you frell. They posted a few things on the kids site. Oh waaa, I checked it out, it’s got barely any members so who cares?!? The posts didn’t hurt anyone in anyway and it’s not going to stop people from joining moparscape, especially the 10 lil kids on that site won’t care after it’s over I’m sure. All of you need to grow up Lewk and AMERIKA are both cool people and they didn’t harm MoparScape in anyway. Thanks.

I could care less about what they did to the site, im talking about what they do every day on the forums.[/quote]

Frell are you 10? Keep qqing you little nerd.

Read full topic

item.title: Unjust Bans
item.dc:creator: @Telenim_Jr Telenim Jr
item.description:
@Telenim_Jr wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:30, topic:335751”]second chances do not come instantly don’t ask for it. Also they should not be GLINED because forums and irc rules do not coincide.[/quote]<+AMERIKA`> All we can do is point out that we have recognized out major mistakes, and that we want the community as a whole to know that we are sorry. We just want everyone to know we’re sorry, and so they can think about allowing us to return or not.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“casey., post:15, topic:335751”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=432132.msg3172258#msg3172258 date=1270521520]
I’m kind of on the same road as Anthony with this one. All types of people here, good and bad, make this community what it is. `Lewk_ and AMERIKA happen to be a part of this as well. The trolling will never stop; if you ban one, ~2 more will come back in their place.
[/quote]
ban more[/quote]

That’s not always the best decision.

item.title: Unjust Bans

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

The Soul:

I’m kind of on the same road as Anthony with this one. All types of people here, good and bad, make this community what it is. `Lewk_ and AMERIKA happen to be a part of this as well. The trolling will never stop; if you ban one, ~2 more will come back in their place.

Than ban them. If I still had my mod I wouldn’t care if you stayed up two weeks creating accounts.
I would sit there and ban each one on the spot.

It’s all we can do. Not banning them show’s our incompetence.

Read full topic

item.title: Unjust Bans

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

I’m kind of on the same road as Anthony with this one. All types of people here, good and bad, make this community what it is. `Lewk_ and AMERIKA happen to be a part of this as well. The trolling will never stop; if you ban one, ~2 more will come back in their place.

I found it odd how they got banned for what they caused to another site, but I guess that’s just me.

Read full topic
